mapper.insert:
insert into online_regist(r_num, c_day, c_cate, c_title, c_name, gender, foreigner, phone_num, home_num, e_mail, regist_path, employment, employment_center, employment_counselor, employment_num)
values(#{r_num}, #{c_day}, #{c_cate}, #{c_title}, #{c_name}, #{gender}, #{foreigner}, #{phone_num}, #{home_num}, #{e_mail}, #{regist_path}, #{employment}, #{employment_center}, #{employment_counselor}, #{employment_num})
